name: AR Spinner Multiplayer
description:
Beyblade Online Multiplayer with Augmented Reality

Instructions:

  • Enter you name 
  • Wait for the cloud  connection
  • Select your Beyblade
  • Place the stadium
  • Search for players and join a room
  • Use the joystick to move

Extra info

  • Augmented Reality only works with the  APK in Android and with an updated version of ARCore
  • You have to find another friend and start a game at the same moment if you want to start playing at the moment. If you have lucky maybe another player already created a room and is waiting for another player to join.  The game only allows 20 CCU.

Credits:

  • Created by Andres Navarro
